sources.title: Survivors | Full Virus Outbreak Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under non-exclusive license from MVD Entertainment Group. All rights received**

Survivors - The outbreak of a deadly virus sends the UK into a state of emergency, into a war it appears destined to lose. In a world without laws, without order and without anybody watching... how far would you go to survive?

2015
Stars: David Anderson, Adrian Annis, Simon Burbage

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.

metadata.Plot: College freshman Cassandra "Cassie" steps into a nightmare of otherworldly visitations after surviving a devastating car accident. Haunted by a grim reaper of a far different kind, her only hope is to cling to chance encounters with her lost love Sean and the aid of a mysterious young priest named Father Jude. It is the spirit of Sean, her soul mate, who guides her to love, but it is her friends Matt, Annabel and Annabel's morose friend Raven who try to draw her to the dark side.
metadata.Actors: Melissa Sagemiller, Wes Bentley, Casey Affleck
